title: How to book Emirates flights at lower fares in 2026: Best time for booking cheapest tickets, other tips for savvy travellers
summary_full: Emirates' busiest January for family travel highlights the advantage of early booking. Travel experts advise booking 2-3 months ahead, especially for Economy and leveraging mid-week travel. Utilising Emirates' Low Fare Calendar and considering off-peak seasons can secure better deals. Loyalty programs and promo codes offer additional savings for savvy travellers.
